topic: Criteria for evaluating the success of prompt-based innovation
content: Generated from lens processing: The next step is to experiment with both individual and collaborative prompt shuffling to observe the diversity of ideas generated. I will also investigate digital tools that facilitate prompt manipulation and evaluate their effectiveness in enhancing creativity. This approach will help refine the methodology and establish criteria for successful prompt innovation.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
